author: elfontan
body:
#### PR description:
Update of the Global Trigger emulator for 2Loose HMT seeds (targeting the 2023 L1 menu).
It relies on the new utm library v0.11.2 recently integrated: https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8386.

This PR includes also an update of the GlobalBoard code to check the HMT condition for all BXs (see the discussion in https://github.com/cms-l1t-offline/cmssw/issues/1071). It should complete the fix of DQM issues at uGT with HMT observed during 2022. Backport to CMSSW_13_0_X in preparation.

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41211.

[cc: @dinyar @eyigitba @fmanteca]

#### PR validation:
Basic tests performed successfully starting from CMSSW_13_0_X_2023-03-31-1100
> cmsrel CMSSW_13_0_X_2023-03-31-1100
> cd CMSSW_13_0_X_2023-03-31-1100/src
> cmsenv
> scram b distclean 
> git cms-checkdeps -a -A
> scram b -j 8
> scram b runtests 
> scram build code-checks
> scram build code-format
title: [Backport] Adding 2Loose HMT showers in the GT emulator
